name: jsonion-remap
description: Remapping JSON objects to a simplified, alternative schema is a breeze with **jsonion-remap** package. Instructions, defining how structure and in part content types are transformed, are coded in a JavaScript object with a slightly special syntax that resembles CSS, goes easy on you with the details and is simple to read and understand.
author: Bla≈æ Beuermann <blazbrmnn@yahoo.com>
